# iosxr_aaa (Resource)

This resource can manage the AAA configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iosxr_aaa" "example" {
  tacacs_server_hosts = [
    {
      address                        = "9.0.1.68"
      port                           = 49
      timeout                        = 10
      holddown_time                  = 300
      key_type_7                     = "0235347225301B204F4F0A0A"
      single_connection              = true
      single_connection_idle_timeout = 1000
    }
  ]
  tacacs_server_key_type_7    = "0235347225301B204F4F0A0A"
  tacacs_server_timeout       = 5
  tacacs_server_holddown_time = 600
  tacacs_server_ipv4_dscp     = "cs6"
  tacacs_server_ipv6_dscp     = "cs6"
  tacacs_server_groups = [
    {
      group_name = "AAA"
      servers = [
        {
          address = "9.0.1.68"
        }
      ]
      vrf           = "VRF1"
      holddown_time = 300
      server_privates = [
        {
          address                        = "9.0.1.68"
          port                           = 49
          key_type_7                     = "0235347225301B204F4F0A0A"
          single_connection              = true
          single_connection_idle_timeout = 1000
          timeout                        = 10
          holddown_time                  = 300
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
  tacacs_source_interface = "MgmtEth0/RP0/CPU0/0"
  tacacs_vrfs = [
    {
      vrf_name         = "VRF1"
      source_interface = "MgmtEth0/RP0/CPU0/0"
    }
  ]
  usernames = [
    {
      name                 = "terraform-user"
      secret_type_10       = "$6$JX.ze16kjuwfCe1.$aAaA/Zc0/lI2C7VrT4PmeBh.tsQj1fKAR3q.Oqq214vrnCLjhezD9/asda5WB8tbO4wqKp3MsA5cv3B2uHJOj/"
      login_history_enable = true
      group_root_lr        = true
    }
  ]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `delete_mode` (String) Configure behavior when deleting/destroying the resource. Either delete the entire object (YANG container) being managed, or only delete the individual resource attributes configured explicitly and leave everything else as-is. Default value is `attributes`.
  - Choices: `all`, `attributes`
- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.
- `tacacs_server_groups` (Attributes List) Server group name (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--tacacs_server_groups))
- `tacacs_server_holddown_time` (Number) Time for which a TACACS server is marked as dead
  - Range: `0`-`1200`
- `tacacs_server_hosts` (Attributes List) Specify a TACACS+ server (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--tacacs_server_hosts))
- `tacacs_server_ipv4_dscp` (String) Set IP DSCP (DiffServ CodePoint)
- `tacacs_server_ipv6_dscp` (String) Set IP DSCP (DiffServ CodePoint)
- `tacacs_server_key_type_6` (String, Sensitive) Specifies that an encrypted type 6 key will follow
- `tacacs_server_key_type_7` (String, Sensitive) Specifies that an encrypted key will follow
- `tacacs_server_timeout` (Number) Time to wait for a TACACS server to reply
  - Range: `1`-`1000`
- `tacacs_source_interface` (String) Specify interface for source address in TACACS+ packets
- `tacacs_vrfs` (Attributes List) VRF for this source interface configuration (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--tacacs_vrfs))
- `usernames` (Attributes List) User name (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--usernames))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the object.

<a id="nestedatt--tacacs_server_groups"></a>
### Nested Schema for `tacacs_server_groups`

Required:

- `group_name` (String) Server group name

Optional:

- `holddown_time` (Number) Time for which TACACS servers of this group is marked as dead
  - Range: `0`-`1200`
- `server_privates` (Attributes List) Specify a private (to this server group) TACACS+ server (max 10) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--tacacs_server_groups--server_privates))
- `servers` (Attributes List) Specify a TACACS+ server (Max 10) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--tacacs_server_groups--servers))
- `vrf` (String) VRF to which this server group belongs to

<a id="nestedatt--tacacs_server_groups--server_privates"></a>
### Nested Schema for `tacacs_server_groups.server_privates`

Required:

- `address` (String) Specify a private (to this server group) TACACS+ server (max 10)
- `order` (Number) This is used to sort the servers in the order of precedence
  - Range: `0`-`4294967295`
- `port` (Number) TCP port for TACACS+ server (default is 49)
  - Range: `1`-`65535`

Optional:

- `holddown_time` (Number) Time for which this TACACS server is marked as dead
  - Range: `0`-`1200`
- `key_type_6` (String, Sensitive) Specifies that an encrypted type 6 key will follow
- `key_type_7` (String, Sensitive) Specifies that an encrypted key will follow
- `single_connection` (Boolean) Reuse connection to this server for all requests(2)
- `single_connection_idle_timeout` (Number) Idle timeout for a single-connection to the server
  - Range: `500`-`7200`
- `timeout` (Number) Time to wait for a TACACS server to reply
  - Range: `1`-`1000`


<a id="nestedatt--tacacs_server_groups--servers"></a>
### Nested Schema for `tacacs_server_groups.servers`

Required:

- `address` (String) Specify a TACACS+ server (Max 10)
- `order` (Number) This is used to sort the servers in the order of precedence
  - Range: `0`-`4294967295`



<a id="nestedatt--tacacs_server_hosts"></a>
### Nested Schema for `tacacs_server_hosts`

Required:

- `address` (String) Specify a TACACS+ server
- `ordering_index` (Number) This is used to sort the servers in the order of precedence
  - Range: `0`-`4294967295`
- `port` (Number) TCP port for TACACS+ server (default is 49)
  - Range: `1`-`65535`

Optional:

- `holddown_time` (Number) Time for which this TACACS server is marked as dead
  - Range: `0`-`1200`
- `key_type_6` (String, Sensitive) Specifies that an encrypted type 6 key will follow
- `key_type_7` (String, Sensitive) Specifies that an encrypted key will follow
- `single_connection` (Boolean) Reuse connection to this server for all requests
- `single_connection_idle_timeout` (Number) Idle timeout for a single-connection to the server
  - Range: `500`-`7200`
- `timeout` (Number) Time to wait for this TACACS server to reply (overrides default)
  - Range: `1`-`1000`


<a id="nestedatt--tacacs_vrfs"></a>
### Nested Schema for `tacacs_vrfs`

Required:

- `source_interface` (String) Specify interface for source address in TACACS+ packets
- `vrf_name` (String) Name of the VRF


<a id="nestedatt--usernames"></a>
### Nested Schema for `usernames`

Required:

- `name` (String) User name
- `order` (Number) This is used to sort the users in the order of precedence
  - Range: `0`-`4294967295`

Optional:

- `directory` (String) Specify the directory of the user
- `group_cisco_support` (Boolean) Cisco support personnel
- `group_maintenance` (Boolean) Maintenance group
- `group_netadmin` (Boolean) Network administrators group
- `group_operator` (Boolean) Operator group
- `group_provisioning` (Boolean) Provisioning group
- `group_read_only_tg` (Boolean) Read only group
- `group_retrieve` (Boolean) Retrieve group
- `group_root_lr` (Boolean) Root LR group
- `group_serviceadmin` (Boolean) Service administrators group
- `group_sysadmin` (Boolean) System administrators group
- `login_history_disable` (Boolean) Disable the display of login history.
- `login_history_enable` (Boolean) Enable the display of login history.
- `policy` (String) Specify the policy common to password and secret for the user
- `secret_type_10` (String, Sensitive) Specifies that SHA512 encrypted password will follow
- `secret_type_8` (String, Sensitive) Specifies that SHA-256 encrypted password will follow
- `secret_type_9` (String, Sensitive) Specifies that scrypt encrypted password will follow
- `shell_type` (String) Specify the shell type of the user
- `user_groups` (Attributes List) Name of the user group (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--usernames--user_groups))

<a id="nestedatt--usernames--user_groups"></a>
### Nested Schema for `usernames.user_groups`

Required:

- `group_name` (String) Name of the user group

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

The [`terraform import` command](https://developer.hashicorp.com/terraform/cli/commands/import) can be used, for example:

```shell
terraform import iosxr_aaa.example ""
```
